name: nuxt2-infinite-scroll
author: HendraPB hendrapratama1493@gmail.com
description: Infinite scroll implementation on vue.js use OMDb API

scripts.postbuild: rimraf functions/ssr && mkdirp functions/ssr && cp -R .nuxt/dist functions/ssr/dist
scripts.postbuildwindows: rimraf functions/ssr && mkdirp functions/ssr && (robocopy .nuxt/dist functions/ssr/dist /s /e) ^& exit 0
